display_long_description:
Join our Discord 👉 https://discord.gg/7HPraHzTtY

# 🦇 The Haunting Grounds Update – Face the Fright! 👻

Step into new arena shooter where reflexes, teamwork, and guts are your only way to survive. In this new co-op survival game, battle through 10 intense waves of ghoulish action — solo or with up to three friends.

[media]

[media]

[media]

[media]

👾 **What’s New:**

Haunting Grounds:
- Co-op Mode – Survive 10 waves with up to 4 players
- 4 Unique Enemies – Bats, Ghosts, Bloaties, and deadly Necromancers appear in randomized waves
- Choose Your Weapon – Revolver (precision), Rocket (splash), Wand (rapid-fire)
- Spooky level design – avoid the lava, climb ramps and hide behind cover
- Upgrades – Boost weapons between waves to fit your playstyle
- Leaderboards – Track your score and rise in global ranks

🎟️ **How to Play**:

Unlock the Ghost Palace Bundle via the Meta Store, in-game Gem Shop, or directly at the attraction. 

**A free trial is also available** 

You can play one full session every 24 hours. After finishing a run, whether you survive all 10 waves or get knocked out, you’ll need to wait a day to play again.

Whether braving it solo or with friends, Haunting Grounds brings spooky action, replayable chaos, and a fight to the finish!

Are you ready to run, gun, and survive? 👻
